O<S>5599</S> foolish<S>453</S> Galatians<S>1052</S>, who<S>5101</S> hath bewitched<S>940</S> you<S>5209</S>, that ye should<S>3982</S> not<S>3361</S> obey<S>3982</S> the truth<S>225</S>, before<S>2596</S> whose<S>3739</S> eyes<S>3788</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> hath been evidently set forth<S>4270</S>, crucified<S>4717</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>?
This<S>5124</S> only<S>3440</S> would<S>2309</S> I learn<S>3129</S> of<S>575</S> you<S>5216</S>, Received ye<S>2983</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S> by<S>1537</S> the works<S>2041</S> of the law<S>3551</S>, or<S>2228</S> by<S>1537</S> the hearing<S>189</S> of faith<S>4102</S>?
Are ye<S>2075</S> so<S>3779</S> foolish<S>453</S>? having begun<S>1728</S> in the Spirit<S>4151</S>, are ye<S>2005</S> now<S>3568</S> made perfect<S>2005</S> by the flesh<S>4561</S>?
Have ye suffered<S>3958</S> so many things<S>5118</S> in vain<S>1500</S>? if it be yet<S>1489</S> <S>2532</S> in vain<S>1500</S>. <sup>so many: or, so great</sup>
He therefore<S>3767</S> that ministereth<S>2023</S> to you<S>5213</S> the Spirit<S>4151</S>, and<S>2532</S> worketh<S>1754</S> miracles<S>1411</S> among<S>1722</S> you<S>5213</S>, doeth he it by<S>1537</S> the works<S>2041</S> of the law<S>3551</S>, or<S>2228</S> by<S>1537</S> the hearing<S>189</S> of faith<S>4102</S>?
Even as<S>2531</S> Abraham<S>11</S> believed<S>4100</S> God<S>2316</S>, and<S>2532</S> it was accounted<S>3049</S> to him<S>846</S> for<S>1519</S> righteousness<S>1343</S>. <sup>accounted: or, imputed</sup>
Know ye<S>1097</S> therefore<S>686</S> that<S>3754</S> they which are of<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S>, the same<S>3778</S> are<S>1526</S> the children<S>5207</S> of Abraham<S>11</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the scripture<S>1124</S>, foreseeing<S>4275</S> that<S>3754</S> God<S>2316</S> would justify<S>1344</S> the heathen<S>1484</S> through<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S>, preached before the gospel<S>4283</S> unto Abraham<S>11</S>, saying,<S>3754</S> In<S>1722</S> thee<S>4671</S> shall<S>1757</S> all<S>3956</S> nations<S>1484</S> be blessed<S>1757</S>.
So then<S>5620</S> they which be of<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S> are blessed<S>2127</S> with<S>4862</S> faithful<S>4103</S> Abraham<S>11</S>.
For<S>1063</S> as many as<S>3745</S> are<S>1526</S> of<S>1537</S> the works<S>2041</S> of the law<S>3551</S> are<S>1526</S> under<S>5259</S> the curse<S>2671</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, Cursed<S>1944</S> is every one<S>3956</S> that<S>3739</S> continueth<S>1696</S> not<S>3756</S> in<S>1722</S> all things<S>3956</S> which<S>3588</S> are written<S>1125</S> in<S>1722</S> the book<S>975</S> of the law<S>3551</S> to do<S>4160</S> them<S>846</S>.
But<S>1161</S> that<S>3754</S> no man<S>3762</S> is justified<S>1344</S> by<S>1722</S> the law<S>3551</S> in the sight<S>3844</S> of God<S>2316</S>, it is evident<S>1212</S>: for<S>3754</S>, The just<S>1342</S> shall live<S>2198</S> by<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the law<S>3551</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> of<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S>: but<S>235</S>, The man<S>444</S> that doeth<S>4160</S> them<S>846</S> shall live<S>2198</S> in<S>1722</S> them<S>846</S>.
Christ<S>5547</S> hath redeemed<S>1805</S> us<S>2248</S> from<S>1537</S> the curse<S>2671</S> of the law<S>3551</S>, being made<S>1096</S> a curse<S>2671</S> for<S>5228</S> us<S>2257</S>: for<S>1063</S> it is written<S>1125</S>, Cursed<S>1944</S> is every one<S>3956</S> that hangeth<S>2910</S> on<S>1909</S> a tree<S>3586</S>:
That<S>2443</S> the blessing<S>2129</S> of Abraham<S>11</S> might come<S>1096</S> on<S>1519</S> the Gentiles<S>1484</S> through<S>1722</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S>; that<S>2443</S> we might receive<S>2983</S> the promise<S>1860</S> of the Spirit<S>4151</S> through<S>1223</S> faith<S>4102</S>.
Brethren<S>80</S>, I speak<S>3004</S> after the manner of<S>2596</S> men<S>444</S>; Though it be but<S>3676</S> a man's<S>444</S> covenant<S>1242</S>, yet if it be confirmed<S>2964</S>, no man<S>3762</S> disannulleth<S>114</S>, or<S>2228</S> addeth thereto<S>1928</S>. <sup>covenant: or, testament</sup>
Now<S>1161</S> to Abraham<S>11</S> and<S>2532</S> his<S>846</S> seed<S>4690</S> were<S>4483</S> the promises<S>1860</S> made<S>4483</S>. He saith<S>3004</S> not<S>3756</S>, And<S>2532</S> to seeds<S>4690</S>, as<S>5613</S> of<S>1909</S> many<S>4183</S>; but<S>235</S> as<S>5613</S> of<S>1909</S> one<S>1520</S>, And<S>2532</S> to thy<S>4675</S> seed<S>4690</S>, which<S>3739</S> is<S>2076</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
And<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> I say<S>3004</S>, that the covenant<S>1242</S>, that was confirmed before<S>4300</S> of<S>5259</S> God<S>2316</S> in<S>1519</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, the law<S>3551</S>, which was<S>1096</S> four hundred<S>5071</S> and<S>2532</S> thirty<S>5144</S> years<S>2094</S> after<S>3326</S>, cannot<S>3756</S> disannul<S>208</S>, that<S>1519</S> it should make<S>2673</S> the promise<S>1860</S> of none effect<S>2673</S>.
For<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> the inheritance<S>2817</S> be of<S>1537</S> the law<S>3551</S>, it is no more<S>3765</S> of<S>1537</S> promise<S>1860</S>: but<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> gave<S>5483</S> it to Abraham<S>11</S> by<S>1223</S> promise<S>1860</S>.
Wherefore<S>5101</S> then<S>3767</S> serveth the law<S>3551</S>? It was added<S>4369</S> because of<S>5484</S> transgressions<S>3847</S>, till<S>891</S> <S>3739</S> the seed<S>4690</S> should come<S>2064</S> to whom<S>3739</S> the promise was made<S>1861</S>; and it was ordained<S>1299</S> by<S>1223</S> angels<S>32</S> in<S>1722</S> the hand<S>5495</S> of a mediator<S>3316</S>.
Now<S>1161</S> a mediator<S>3316</S> is<S>2076</S> not<S>3756</S> a mediator of one<S>1520</S>, but<S>1161</S> God<S>2316</S> is<S>2076</S> one<S>1520</S>.
Is the law<S>3551</S> then<S>3767</S> against<S>2596</S> the promises<S>1860</S> of God<S>2316</S>? God forbid<S>3361</S> <S>1096</S>: for<S>1063</S> if<S>1487</S> there had been<S>1325</S> a law<S>3551</S> given<S>1325</S> which<S>3588</S> could<S>1410</S> have given life<S>2227</S>, verily<S>3689</S> righteousness<S>1343</S> should<S>302</S> have been<S>2258</S> by<S>1537</S> the law<S>3551</S>.
But<S>235</S> the scripture<S>1124</S> hath concluded<S>4788</S> all<S>3956</S> under<S>5259</S> sin<S>266</S>, that<S>2443</S> the promise<S>1860</S> by<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S> of Jesus<S>2424</S> Christ<S>5547</S> might be given<S>1325</S> to them that believe<S>4100</S>.
But<S>1161</S> before<S>4253</S> faith<S>4102</S> came<S>2064</S>, we were kept<S>5432</S> under<S>5259</S> the law<S>3551</S>, shut up<S>4788</S> unto<S>1519</S> the faith<S>4102</S> which should afterwards<S>3195</S> be revealed<S>601</S>.
Wherefore<S>5620</S> the law<S>3551</S> was<S>1096</S> our<S>2257</S> schoolmaster<S>3807</S> to bring us unto<S>1519</S> Christ<S>5547</S>, that<S>2443</S> we might be justified<S>1344</S> by<S>1537</S> faith<S>4102</S>.
But<S>1161</S> after that faith<S>4102</S> is come<S>2064</S>, we are<S>2070</S> no longer<S>2089</S> <S>3765</S> under<S>5259</S> a schoolmaster<S>3807</S>.
For<S>1063</S> ye are<S>2075</S> all<S>3956</S> the children<S>5207</S> of God<S>2316</S> by<S>1223</S> faith<S>4102</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
For<S>1063</S> as many of you as<S>3745</S> have been baptized<S>907</S> into<S>1519</S> Christ<S>5547</S> have put on<S>1746</S> Christ<S>5547</S>.
There is<S>1762</S> neither<S>3756</S> Jew<S>2453</S> nor<S>3761</S> Greek<S>1672</S>, there is<S>1762</S> neither<S>3756</S> bond<S>1401</S> nor<S>3761</S> free<S>1658</S>, there is<S>1762</S> neither<S>3756</S> male<S>730</S> nor<S>2532</S> female<S>2338</S>: for<S>1063</S> ye<S>5210</S> are<S>2075</S> all<S>3956</S> one<S>1520</S> in<S>1722</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
And<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> ye<S>5210</S> be Christ's<S>5547</S>, then<S>686</S> are ye<S>2075</S> Abraham's<S>11</S> seed<S>4690</S>, and<S>2532</S> heirs<S>2818</S> according<S>2596</S> to the promise<S>1860</S>.
